name: Zucchini Carpaccio Salad with Parmesan, Basil, and Walnuts
description: Raw zucchini is beautiful and tasty when sliced carpaccio-thin and topped with olive oil, fresh lemon, Parmesan, walnuts and basil leaves. Try it as a starter, side dish or even as a light lunch.
recipeIngredient: 1 pound zucchini (about 2 medium), sliced into 1/16th-inch disks on a mandoline
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/2 cup chopped walnuts, toasted if desired
3 tablespoons finely sliced fresh basil leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle zucchini slices with extra virgin olive oil and lemon juice, and season to taste with salt and pepper. Arrange on four dinner plates in overlapping concentric circles. Sprinkle Parmesan cheese, walnuts and basil over top. Serve immediately.
